title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin gives his reason why it's time for Tom Brady to retire from the NFL after an unprecedented career and 7 Super Bowl titles. He explains the big difference for Russell Wilson moving from the Seahawks to the Broncos and why he struggled at the end of their loss to Seattle. He compares the 2 best young quarterbacks in the NFL, Patrick Mahomes and Justin Herbert, before they face off on Thursday Night Football. Plus, USC head coach Lincoln Riley joins the show to talk about their hot start to the season and how he's adjusted to using the transfer portal to his advantage. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
